Summary: Red blue white lights flickering. Object appairs to be completely stationary in sky.
divs: Sighting DetailsLooking out on my patio at roughly 11:50 pm to see what I thought at first was a star or plane but after going inside for 5 minutes I came back out to see object still in the exact same position with the same colored lights flashing. Just now what looks like a small meteor passed on the left hand side of the flashing lights. The object seems to get slightly brighter then dim every few minutes. The object is completly still and has not moved in almost 15 minutes. I will write more later.
trends: There have been 54 other sightings in Vancouver
There were no other sightings in Vancouver on or around November 14th 2008
